name: Magic Hands
description:
Make hand gestures over the internet with up to 16 players!

Featuring some classic gestures such as 'rock' and 'scissors', this piece of software will provide entertainment for you and your friends.

Hosting a multiplayer session may require port mapping, but joining a session will not. Supports LAN and internet connectivity.

Minimum Requirements

  • Windows XP+, OS X 10.7+
  • 800MHz processor
  • 80MB RAM
  • 640x480 display
  • OpenGL 2.1+ support
  • 10MB free storage
